sections.title: Umbral Agent (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Umbral Agent class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Umbral Agent)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with the spiked chain weapon.

sections.title: Blessings of Darkness (Umbral Agent)
sections.description: Grants the Darkness domain using class level as effective cleric level for domain powers, but without bonus spells or domain spell slots.

sections.title: Tenebrous Magic (Umbral Agent)
sections.description: Grants Tenebrous Spell as a bonus feat without increasing spell level or casting time, and provides enhanced bonuses for darkness, shadow, and illusion (shadow) spells.

sections.title: Umbral Courtier ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Umbral Agent)
sections.description: Provides a competence bonus equal to class level on Bluff, Diplomacy, and Knowledge (nobility) checks.

sections.title: Darkvision ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Umbral Agent)
sections.description: Grants darkvision with 60-foot range at 2nd level, extending existing darkvision by 30 feet, with additional range increases at 7th level.

sections.title: Shadow Chains (Sp) (Umbral Agent)
sections.description: Enhances touch of darkness with additional daily use, 5-foot reach extension via shadowy chains, and potential entanglement on failed Reflex save.

sections.title: Shadow Jump (Su) (Umbral Agent)
sections.description: Grants the supernatural ability to travel between shadows, functioning identically to the shadowdancer ability.

sections.title: Unnerving Gaze (Su) (Umbral Agent)
sections.description: Provides a gaze attack that causes shaken condition within 30 feet, with increasing potency at higher levels and immunity to kyton unnerving gaze.

sections.title: Grasping Darkness (Sp) (Umbral Agent)
sections.description: Enhances shadow chains with additional daily use, extended reach, and grappling ability using Wisdom modifier for CMB with bonuses in dim light.

sections.title: Crushing Umbra (Sp) (Umbral Agent)
sections.description: Allows at-will use of touch of darkness with maximum reach extension, and adds constriction damage plus strangling effects to grappled targets.
